DOC.brief_title: The Effect Ethinyl Estradiol Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Women Undergoing Intrauterine Insemination
DOC.detailed_description: The proposal This study approve institutional review board institution 's ethical committee , Participants sign write consent enter study . All patient randomly divide two group , A B. Stimulation begin day 3 administration 100 mg clomifen citrate ( CC ) daily 5 day . On day 8 , ethinyl estradiol give daily 5 day group A placebo give 5 day group B . Plasma level estradiol ( E2 ) , Luteinizing hormone ( LH ) Follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) evaluate day 3 13 menstrual cycle . Ultrasound examination do day 3 , 13 day HCG administration IUI determine endometrial thickness , number follicle size dominant follicle . When diameter least one follicle reach equal great 18 mm , human chronic gonadotrophin ( HCG ) 10,000 IU administer . The pulsatility index also record uterine artery day HCG administration . A single IUI perform 24-36 hour administration hCG . Pregnancy confirm increase level concentration serum Î²HCG assess 14 day IUI
DOC.criteria: The patient first treatment cycle Age 25 30 year , Infertility least 2 year ' duration , Oligomenorrhea amenorrhea associate positive Progesterone challenge test Women normal concentration prolactin , free thyroxin thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) Women whose partner abnormal semen analysis accord World Health Organization Women uterine tubal abnormality hysterosalpingography , woman body mass index > 30 kg/m2 .
